CustomField.formula:
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Statut__c ,"Nouvelle") , IMAGE("/resource/1557245962000/ICONS_Nouvelle?", "Nouvelle", 30 ,30 ) ,
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Statut__c ,"Active") , IMAGE("/resource/1552570497000/ICONS_ADR_Actif?", "Active", 30 ,30 ) ,
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Statut__c ,"Supprimée") , IMAGE("/resource/1557473997000/ICONS_Supprimee", "Supprimée", 30 ,30 ) ,
"" )))
CustomField.label: Icone statut
